alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 2:34AM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Estancia Valley, and Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40 from Tijeras Pass through Clines Corners. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
